channel.title: Bug the hell out of people with Microsoft Word! (Great for School!)
channel.description:
This is garanteed (sp?) to annoy someone using microsoft Word!!!!
1. Open Microsoft Word 2. If theres not already an open, blank document go to file -> new 3. Type in random letters such as [code]slekfjasld[/code] 4. It now should be underlined with a red squigly thing 5. Put your mouse on the red squigly thing 6. It should now look like this:[img]http://img246.imageshack.us/img246/1148/tutvy7.png[/img] 7. Put your mouse over the little blue box thing 8. click on the little arrow thing so it should look like this: [img]http://img206.imageshack.us/img206/6843/tutvr6.png[/img] 9. Click on the highlighted thing on the picture above. 10. Where it says "replace" type in the word the and where it says "with" write Omg im a 1337 h4x0r!! or VIRUS VIRUS RESTART COMPUTER! 11. Press ok, or accept or whatever it says 12. type the word the 13. press the space bar 14. Now wait for someone to go on that computer and use microsoft word and type the word "the" and watch em go psycho :P
[b]Ron: There is no talking of rep on these forums. Sorry.[/b]

haha once i did this but i changed my friends name to penis and teacher comes along and tells him to put his name on it he types “Harley lewis” auto changed to Penis lewis

item.title: Bug the hell out of people with Microsoft Word! (Great for School!)
item.dc:creator: @Fireeater93 Fireeater93
item.description:
@Fireeater93 wrote:

This is garanteed (sp?) to annoy someone using microsoft Word!!!

  1. Open Microsoft Word
  2. If theres not already an open, blank document go to file -> new
  3. Type in random letters such as slekfjasld
  4. It now should be underlined with a red squigly thing
  5. Put your mouse on the red squigly thing
  6. It should now look like this:
  7. Put your mouse over the little blue box thing
  8. click on the little arrow thing so it should look like this:
  9. Click on the highlighted thing on the picture above.
  10. Where it says “replace” type in the word the and where it says “with” write Omg im a 1337 h4x0r!! or VIRUS VIRUS RESTART COMPUTER!
  11. Press ok, or accept or whatever it says
  12. type the word the
  13. press the space bar
  14. Now wait for someone to go on that computer and use microsoft word and type the word “the” and watch em go psycho

Ron: There is no talking of rep on these forums. Sorry.
